EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Information (1323959817.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Arthur,
I enjoyed our conversation as well! It was a pleasure learning a little bit about you and I look forward to having the opportunity to work with you in the near future. If you ever have any questions please do not hesitate to reach out to me. I will forward your information to my Associate that works with Accenture to see if she can be of any assistance on getting a contact person for you to reach out to.
Have a great day and a very happy holiday if I do not speak with you before then!
Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: Arthur [mailto:rogea8@aol.com] Sent: Wednesday, December 14, 2011 5:00 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: MBO Information
Dear Nicolette:
I thoroughly enjoyed our telephone discussion this afternoon and the excellent, and informative information that you provided during our telephone discussions. Accordingly, I am certainly impressed with the business operations and professional services provided by MBO Partners, and undoubtedly I sincerely believe that MBO Partners would provide the precise and most professional services required by my consulting practice. I will certainly send you a copy of my professional profile and the technology commercialization position from Accenture tomorrow. Thank you very much, and please call me or send me an e-mail should you have any questions or other concerns.
Arthur -----Original Message----- From: Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com> To: Arthur <rogea8@aol.com> Sent: Wed, Dec 14, 2011 11:39 am Subject: MBO Information
Hi Arthur,
It was a pleasure speaking with you today! Thank you for your interest in MBO Partners. Ive included a few items as promised regarding the MBO Program:
Link to our true group benefits: http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-exec-group-benefits Link to a summary of the value of using MBO Partners: http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Introduction.pdf Link to our Expense Policy: http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Expense_Policy.pdf Link to a video about How We Help Independent Consultants:http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zKDzwSTmGv4&hd=1
Using MBO Partners versus working on a 1099 basis:http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_vs_1099_Comparison.pdf
You may also look at some of the stories from indepdenents who use MBO Partners:http://info.mbopartners.com/meet-the-independents.html
Also, below are a few articles just for you to read at your leisure:
http://www.channelinsider.com/c/a/Spotlight/Top-Mistakes-New-IT-Consultants-Make-And-How-to-Avoid-Making-Them-Yourself-180466/
http://www.marketwire.com/press-release/Landmark-National-Study-Reveals-Millions-Join-New-Age-Career-Independence-Surprising-1557357.htm
If you have any additional questions for me feel free to schedule a convenient time using my online schedule: https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK
Have a great day and I look forward to speaking with you again soon!
Thank you, Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
